level2.h2: Auomtaic insertion of content on title page
level2.p: The title page has example of boiler text: NLB Norge 2015 and Hefte 1 av 2. The year changes automatically in NorBraille every new year. NorBraille is not an open source tool and we can not edit the template/the title page unless we do it manually in the PEF file. Volume number x of y is printed on every titlepage. The dividing into volumes happens in NorBraille.

level2.h2: "About the book" - Standard text in first volume
level2.p: On the third page is a standard text "Om boka" ("About the book") that is inserted automatically in the first volume of all productions. It has standard text as "Unconctracted braille" and "The book shall not be returned".
Text in margin (in original book) is an example of text that get an automatic inserteed word in our braille books (Margtekst:)

sidebar.p: This is an example of margin tekst, and you will in the PEF se that the word "Margtekst" is added by NorBraille.
